events.message: I received my order last week but I want to request a refund because the product is not what I expected and I no longer need it.
The customer request has been categorized under Refund due to their mention of wanting to return the product and get their money back.
The case has now been assigned to agent Laura M. for further handling regarding the refund request.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, we need the original order number and a brief reason for the return.
Sure, the order number is 123456789. I just found out I ordered the wrong size, so I'd like to return it and get a refund.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund once we receive the returned product. Please use the prepaid label included with your package for the return shipment.
Thanks for the quick reply and clear instructions. I’ll send the item back today using the label.
We have received your returned item and processed your refund. You should see the amount reflected on your payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
As your refund has been completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting our support team.
